title: Running Dark
description: International intrigue and adventure combine in Running Dark, by Jamie Freveletti , the pulse-pounding sequel to Running from the Devil . Bestselling author Lee Child hailed Freveletti’s debut novel as, “Just terrific—full of thrills and tradecraft, pace and peril.” Now she brings back marathon runner and scientist Emma Caldwell in a gripping tale that combines terrorism, Somali pirates, and a possible chemical catastrophe as it races at breakneck speed into the most dangerous places in the world.
author: Jamie Freveletti
